description: common meta info, not specific to any code

metaInfos.name: section_run
metaInfos.description: Every section_run represents a single call of a program. What exactly is contained in a run depends on the run type and the program.

metaInfos.name: section_method
metaInfos.description: Every section_method section contains the various parameters that define the theory used and he approximations done (convergence thresholds,...)

metaInfos.name: section_system_description
metaInfos.description: Every section_system_description section contains the properties required to describe the Physical system simulated: the given atomic configuration, if relevant the periodic cell, extenal potentials,...

metaInfos.name: section_particle_kind
metaInfos.description: Every section_particle_kind contains information about a different kind of particle, and is identified by a unique string.

metaInfos.name: section_particle
metaInfos.description: Every section_particle represents a particle (atom, ghost,...).

metaInfos.name: particle_kind_nparticles
metaInfos.description: Number of particles of this kind

metaInfos.name: particle_number
metaInfos.description: Total number of particles

metaInfos.name: section_particle_kind_ref
metaInfos.description: Every section_particle_kind_ref refers to a section_particle_kind by using the same unique string.

metaInfos.name: section_particle_ref
metaInfos.description: Every section_particle_ref refers to a section_particle by its index within the particle kind.

metaInfos.name: section_single_point_evaluation
metaInfos.description: Every section_single_point_evaluation section contains the values computated or evaluated during a single point evaluation.

metaInfos.name: energy
metaInfos.description: Some energy value

metaInfos.name: energy_component_per_atom_scf
metaInfos.description: An energy component per atom during scf

metaInfos.name: energy_component_per_atom
metaInfos.description: A final value of an energy component per atom

metaInfos.name: energy_component_scf
metaInfos.description: An energy component of the non final, non converged energy, expected to be an extensive property

metaInfos.name: energy_component
metaInfos.description: A final value of an energy component, expected to be an extensive property.

metaInfos.name: energy_total_potential_per_atom
metaInfos.description: A final value of a total potential energy per atom

metaInfos.name: section_eigenvalues
metaInfos.description: eigenvalues of some energy

metaInfos.name: eigenvalues_kpoints_number
metaInfos.description: number of kpoints

metaInfos.name: eigenvalues_eigenvalues_number
metaInfos.description: number of eigenvalues

metaInfos.name: eigenvalues_kpoints
metaInfos.description: kpoints on which the eigenvalues were evaluated

metaInfos.name: eigenvalues_eigenvalues
metaInfos.description: Eigenvalues

metaInfos.name: eigenvalues_occupation
metaInfos.description: Occupation of that eigenfunction

metaInfos.name: eigenvalues_kind
metaInfos.description: A short string describing the kind of eigenvalues, as defined in the [eigenvalues_kind wiki page](https://nomad-dev.rz-berlin.mpg.de/wiki/MetaInfo/eigenvalues_kind).

metaInfos.name: energy_total_potential_per_atom_scf
metaInfos.description: A final value of a total potential energy per atom during the scf

metaInfos.name: energy_total_potential
metaInfos.description: A final value of a total potential energy. Different total energies might have different 0, and so might not be directly comparable.

metaInfos.name: energy_total_potential_scf
metaInfos.description: A final value of a total potential energy during the scf. Different total energies might have different 0, and so might not be directly comparable.
Information on the scf procedure
metaInfos.name: scf_info

metaInfos.description: Every section_scf_iteration section represents an scf iteration
metaInfos.name: section_scf_iteration
message_debug
metaInfos.description: A debugging message of the computational program

metaInfos.name: message_debug_run
metaInfos.description: A debugging message of the computational program, associated with a run

metaInfos.name: message_debug_evaluation
metaInfos.description: A debugging message of the computational program, associated with a single point evaluation

metaInfos.name: message_info
metaInfos.description: An information message of the computational program

metaInfos.name: message_info_run
metaInfos.description: An information message of the computational program, associated with a run

metaInfos.name: message_info_evaluation
metaInfos.description: An information message of the computational program, associated with a a single point evaluation

metaInfos.name: message_warning
metaInfos.description: A warning message of the computational program

metaInfos.name: message_warning_run
metaInfos.description: A warning message of the computational program, associated with a run

metaInfos.name: message_warning_evaluation
metaInfos.description: A warning message of the computational program

metaInfos.name: message_error
metaInfos.description: An error message of the computational program

metaInfos.name: message_error_run
metaInfos.description: An error message of the computational program, associated with a run

metaInfos.name: message_error_evaluation
metaInfos.description: An error message of the computational program, associated with a single point evaluation

metaInfos.name: parsing_message_debug
metaInfos.description: A debugging message of the parsing program

metaInfos.name: parsing_message_debug_run
metaInfos.description: A debugging message of the parsing program, associated with a run

metaInfos.name: parsing_message_debug_evaluation
metaInfos.description: A debugging message of the parsing program, associated with a single point evaluation

metaInfos.name: parsing_message_info
metaInfos.description: An information message of the parsing program

metaInfos.name: parsing_message_info_run
metaInfos.description: An information message of the parsing program, associated with a run

metaInfos.name: parsing_message_info_evaluation
metaInfos.description: An information message of the parsing program, associated with a a single point evaluation

metaInfos.name: parsing_message_warning
metaInfos.description: A warning message of the parsing program

metaInfos.name: parsing_message_warning_run
metaInfos.description: A warning message of the parsing program, associated with a run

metaInfos.name: parsing_message_warning_evaluation
metaInfos.description: A warning message of the parsing program

metaInfos.name: parsing_message_error
metaInfos.description: An error message of the parsing program

metaInfos.name: parsing_message_error_run
metaInfos.description: An error message of the parsing program, associated with a run

metaInfos.name: parsing_message_error_evaluation
metaInfos.description: An error message of the parsing program, associated with a single point evaluation

Exchange Correlation (XC) potential energy: the integral of the first order functional derivative of the XC_functional_sc, integral v_xc*electron_density, i.e. the component of xc that is in the sum of the eigenvalues. Typically DFT only. Value during the SCF cycle (not converged)
metaInfos.name: energy_XC_potential_sc_scf

metaInfos.description: Exchange Correlation (XC) potential energy: the integral of the first order functional derivative of XC_functional_sc, integral v_xc*electron_density, i.e. the component of XC that is in the sum of the eigenvalues. Typically DFT only. Value associated with the configuration, should be the most converged value.
metaInfos.name: energy_XC_potential_sc

metaInfos.description: XC energy (integral of e_xc in the DFT case) during the scf iterations using XC_functional_sc
metaInfos.name: energy_XC_sc_scf

metaInfos.description: Final exchange correlation (XC) energy calculated with XC_method_sc
metaInfos.name: energy_XC_sc

metaInfos.description: Final exchange correlation (XC) energy calculated with XC_functional
metaInfos.name: energy_XC

metaInfos.description: Parameters that control the simulation
metaInfos.name: settings_simulation

metaInfos.description: Parameters that control the simulation and are in the method section
metaInfos.name: settings_method

metaInfos.description: Method parameters that control single point evaluation. This covers things like the theory level, but not the temperature of an molecular dynamics.
metaInfos.name: settings_single_point_method

metaInfos.description: Parameters connected with defining the exchange correlation (XC) treatment for the final energy and related quantities
metaInfos.name: settings_XC

metaInfos.description: Parameters connected with defining the exchange correlation (XC) treatment during the self consisten cycle and thus valid for the self consistent density.
metaInfos.name: settings_XC_sc

metaInfos.description: Parameters connected with defining the exchange correlation (XC) functional
metaInfos.name: settings_XC_functional

metaInfos.description: Parameters and information connected Exchange correlation (XC) functional used in the self consistency cycle (and thus the one for the self consistent density)
metaInfos.name: settings_XC_functional_sc

metaInfos.description: Exchange correlation (XC) method used during the self consitency cycle and thus valid for the self consistent density. This string ignores convergence settings, and might collapse several similar methods. Built joining XC_functional_sc '_' SIC_sc '_' van_der_Waals_sc '_' relativity_treatment_sc. For empty strings the connecting character is skipped.
metaInfos.name: XC_method_sc

metaInfos.description: Exchange correlation (XC) method used for the final energy and related quantities in standarized short form, this string ignores convergence settings, and might collapse several similar methods. Built joining *only* the values that are different from their self consistent (sc) values in the following order: postHF_method '_' XC_functional '_' SIC '_' van_der_Waals '_' relativity_treatment '@' XC_method_sc. With empty strings the connecting character is skipped.
metaInfos.name: XC_method

metaInfos.description: Parameters and information connected with self interaction correction (SIC) method used
metaInfos.name: settings_SIC

metaInfos.description: Short string for the self interaction (SIC) treatment used to calculate the final energy and related quantities. No special treatment if skipped or empty. Other SIC treatment strings as described on the [SIC wiki page](https://nomad-dev.rz-berlin.mpg.de/wiki/MetaData/SIC).
metaInfos.name: SIC

metaInfos.description: Short string for the self interaction (SIC) treatment used during the self consistency cicle (and thus valid for the self consitent density). No special treatment if skipped or empty. Other SIC treatment strings as described on the [SIC_sc wiki page](https://nomad-dev.rz-berlin.mpg.de/wiki/MetaData/SIC_sc).
metaInfos.name: SIC_sc

metaInfos.description: Parameters and information connected with the relativity treatment used in the calculation
metaInfos.name: settings_relativity_treatment

metaInfos.description: Parameters and information connected with the van der Waals treatment used in the calculation
metaInfos.name: settings_van_der_Waals_treatment

metaInfos.description: Short string describing the relativity treatment used for the calculation of the final energy and related quantities. No special treatment if skipped or empty. Relativity treatment strings are described on the [relativity_treatment wiki page](https://nomad-dev.rz-berlin.mpg.de/wiki/MetaData/relativity_treatment).
metaInfos.name: relativity_treatment

metaInfos.description: Short string describing the relativity treatment used during the self consitency cycle (and thus valid for the self consistent density. No special treatment if skipped or empty. Relativity treatment strings are described on the [relativity_treatment_sc wiki page](https://nomad-dev.rz-berlin.mpg.de/wiki/MetaData/relativity_treatment_sc).
metaInfos.name: relativity_treatment_sc

metaInfos.description: Short string describing the van der Waals treatment in the final energy. No treatement if skipped or empty. Van der Waals treatement strings are described on the [van_der_Waals_treatment wiki page](https://nomad-dev.rz-berlin.mpg.de/wiki/MetaData/van_der_Waals_treatment).
metaInfos.name: van_der_Waals_treatment

metaInfos.description: Short string describing the van der Waals treatment during the self consitency cycle (and thus valid for the self consistent density). No treatement if skipped or empty. Van der Waals treatement strings are described on the [van_der_Waals_treatment_sc wiki page](https://nomad-dev.rz-berlin.mpg.de/wiki/MetaData/van_der_Waals_treatment_sc).
metaInfos.name: van_der_Waals_treatment_sc

metaInfos.description: Exchange correlation (XC) functional used for the final energy and related quantities in a unique short form as described in the [XC_functional wiki page](https://nomad-dev.rz-berlin.mpg.de/wiki/MetaInfo/XC_functional).
metaInfos.name: XC_functional

metaInfos.description: String that represent the exchange correlation (XC) treatment in a unique short form. This string keeps in account all settings in settings_XC. It is built from XC_method plus '_' and the first 10 characters of the base64 url encoding of SHA 512 checksum of a normalized json with all settings_XC exluding this one
metaInfos.name: XC_method_unique

metaInfos.description: Exchange correlation (XC) functional used during the scf cycle (and thus for the density) in a unique short form as described in the [XC_functional_sc wiki page](https://nomad-dev.rz-berlin.mpg.de/wiki/MetaInfo/XC_functional_sc).
metaInfos.name: XC_functional_sc

metaInfos.description: Some exchange (X) energy.
metaInfos.name: energy_type_X

metaInfos.description: Some correlation (C) energy.
metaInfos.name: energy_type_C

metaInfos.description: Some exchange-correlation (XC) energy.
metaInfos.name: energy_type_XC

metaInfos.description: Component of the exchange (X) energy at the LDA level calculated with the self consistent density of the target functional.
metaInfos.name: energy_X_LDA

metaInfos.description: Component of the exchange correlation (XC) energy at the LDA level calculated with the self consistent density of the target functional.
metaInfos.name: energy_XC_LDA

metaInfos.description: Component of the correlation (C) energy at the LDA level calculated with the self consistent density of the target functional.
metaInfos.name: energy_C_LDA

metaInfos.description: Component of the exchange (X) energy at the (Meta)GGA level using the self consistent density of the target functional (no exact exchange mixin, full unscaled value)
metaInfos.name: energy_X_mGGA

metaInfos.description: Component of the exchange (X) energy at the (Meta)GGA level using the self consistent density of the target functional, scaled accordingly to the mixing parameter
metaInfos.name: energy_X_mGGA_scaled

metaInfos.description: Component of the exchange and correlation (XC) energy at the (Meta)GGA level using the self consistent density of the target functional scaled accordingly to the mixing parameter
metaInfos.name: energy_XC_mGGA_scaled

metaInfos.description: Component of the exchange and correlation (XC) energy at the (Meta)GGA level using the self consistent density of the target functional (no exact exchange mixin, full unscaled value)
metaInfos.name: energy_XC_mGGA

metaInfos.description: Component of the correlation (C) energy at the (Meta)GGA level using the self consistent density of the target functional (no exact exchange mixin, full unscaled value)
metaInfos.name: energy_C_mGGA

metaInfos.description: Converged exchange (X) energy using XC_functional
metaInfos.name: energy_X

metaInfos.description: Converged correlation (C) energy using XC_functional
metaInfos.name: energy_C

metaInfos.description: Converged exchange (X) energy using XC_functional_sc
metaInfos.name: energy_X_sc

metaInfos.description: Converged correlation (C) energy using XC_functional_sc
metaInfos.name: energy_C_sc

metaInfos.description: Some kind of converged van der Waals energy
metaInfos.name: energy_type_van_der_Waals

metaInfos.description: Converged van der Waals energy calculated using the method described in van_der_Waals
metaInfos.name: energy_van_der_Waals

metaInfos.description: Converged van der Waals energy using the Tkatchenko Scheffler method
metaInfos.name: energy_van_der_Waals_Tkatchenko_Scheffler

metaInfos.description: Total energy using XC_method_sc per atom extapolated for T=0
metaInfos.name: energy_total_T0_sc_per_atom

metaInfos.description: Total energy using XC_method per atom extapolated for T=0
metaInfos.name: energy_T0_per_atom

metaInfos.description: Some estimate of a quantity contributing to the error of the final values at self consistency level
metaInfos.name: error_estimate_partial_sc

metaInfos.description: Some estimate of a quantity contributing to the error of the final values
metaInfos.name: error_estimate_partial

metaInfos.description: Some estimate of the a quantity contibuting to the error on the energy during the scf
metaInfos.name: error_estimate_partial_sc_scf

metaInfos.description: Change of total energy during an scf iteration
metaInfos.name: energy_change_sc_scf

metaInfos.description: Total electronic energy calculated with XC_method_sc during the scf iterations
metaInfos.name: energy_total_sc_scf

metaInfos.description: Total energy (or equivalently free energy) calculated with XC_method_sc extrapolated for T=0 during the scf iterations
metaInfos.name: energy_total_T0_sc_scf

metaInfos.description: Free energy (whose minimum gives the smeared occupation for the density) calculated with XC_method_sc during the scf iterations
metaInfos.name: energy_free_sc_scf

metaInfos.description: Free energy (whose minimum gives the smeared occupation for the density) calculated with XC_method_sc
metaInfos.name: energy_free_sc

metaInfos.description: A total (final, converged) energy calculated with XC_method_sc
metaInfos.name: energy_total_sc

metaInfos.description: Total energy (or equivalently free energy) calculated with XC_method_sc extrapolated for T=0 (for metals)
metaInfos.name: energy_total_T0_sc

metaInfos.description: Information on the run which *in theory* should have no influence on the results
metaInfos.name: accessory_info_run

metaInfos.description: Information on an scf iteration which *in theory* should have no influence on the results
metaInfos.name: accessory_info_scf

metaInfos.description: Information on a single point evaluation which *in theory* should have no influence on the results
metaInfos.name: accessory_info_evaluation

metaInfos.name: time_info_run

metaInfos.name: time_info_evaluation

metaInfos.name: time_run_date_0

metaInfos.name: time_run_wall_end

metaInfos.name: time_run_date_end

metaInfos.name: time_run_cpu1_0

metaInfos.name: time_scf_date_0

metaInfos.description: Internal wall clock time at the end of an scf iteration
metaInfos.name: time_scf_wall_end

metaInfos.description: End date of scf stored as time since the unix epoch (00:00:00 UTC on 1 January 1970) in seconds

metaInfos.name: time_evaluation_wall_0

metaInfos.description: Internal wall clock time at the end of the single point evaluation

metaInfos.name: time_evaluation_date_end

metaInfos.name: time_evaluation_cpu1_0

metaInfos.description: End time of the single point evaluation on CPU 1
metaInfos.name: time_evaluation_cpu1_end

metaInfos.description: Sum of the eigenvalues of the hamiltonian matrix defined by XC_method_sc per atom
metaInfos.name: energy_sum_eigenvalues_per_atom

metaInfos.description: Sum of the eigenvalues of the hamiltonian matrix defined by XC_method_sc per atom during the scf iterations.
metaInfos.name: energy_sum_eigenvalues_per_atom_scf

metaInfos.description: Sum of the eigenvalues of the hamiltonian matrix defined by XC_method_sc
metaInfos.name: energy_sum_eigenvalues_sc

metaInfos.description: Sum of the eigenvalues of the hamiltonian matrix defined by XC_method_sc during the scf iterations.
metaInfos.name: energy_sum_eigenvalues_sc_scf

metaInfos.description: parameters of one particle kind
metaInfos.name: settings_particle_kind

metaInfos.description: Information on the program that generated the data
metaInfos.name: program_info

metaInfos.description: Version of the program that was used
metaInfos.name: program_version

metaInfos.description: Name of the program that generated the data
metaInfos.name: program_name

metaInfos.description: Program compilation date and time as seconds from unix epoch (00:00:00 UTC on 1 January 1970) in seconds. Default to GMT timezone for date and times without timezone.
metaInfos.name: program_compilation_datetime

metaInfos.description: Host on which the program was compiled
metaInfos.name: program_compilation_host

metaInfos.description: Post hartree fock method parameters
metaInfos.name: settings_post_HF

metaInfos.description: Møller–Plesset method parameters
metaInfos.name: settings_MP

metaInfos.description: Coupled Clusters method parameters
metaInfos.name: settings_CC

metaInfos.description: GW method parameters
metaInfos.name: settings_GW

metaInfos.description: Multi-configurational self-consistent field method parameters
metaInfos.name: settings_MCSCF

metaInfos.description: Multireference single and double configuration interaction method parameters
metaInfos.name: settings_MR

metaInfos.description: Post Hartree-Fock method in standarized form. This is not fully unique. Some of the methods are: full-CI; CCS,CCS(D), CCSD, CCSD(T), CCSDT(Q)...; MP2, MP3, MP4,...; GW; MCSCF,CASSCF,CASPT2,MRCISD. The list should be extended or improved in particular with respect to the multi reference or local methods. If the value is absent or '' then no post HF method has been used.
metaInfos.name: post_HF_method

metaInfos.description: Properties actually defining the current configuration
metaInfos.name: configuration_core

metaInfos.description:
Which of the basis vectors use periodic boundary conditions.
    A value is valid from the definition point for all subsequent values until redefined
    (i.e. if not changing it can be defined just once at the beginning).
metaInfos.name: configuration_periodic_dimensions

metaInfos.description: Positions of the particles (this defines a configuration and is required).
metaInfos.name: particle_position

metaInfos.description: Forces on the particles as minus gradient of energy_total.
metaInfos.name: particle_forces

metaInfos.description: Forces on the particles as minus gradient of energy_total_T0.
metaInfos.name: particle_forces_T0

metaInfos.description: Forces on the particles as minus gradient of energy_total_sc.
metaInfos.name: particle_forces_sc

metaInfos.description: Forces on the particles as minus gradient of energy_total_T0_sc.
metaInfos.name: particle_forces_T0_sc

metaInfos.description: Forces on the particles as minus gradient of energy_free_sc.
metaInfos.name: particle_forces_free_sc

metaInfos.description: Forces on the particles as minus gradient of energy_free.
metaInfos.name: particle_forces_free

metaInfos.description: Some forces on the particles (i.e. minus derivatives of some energy with respect to the particle position).
metaInfos.name: particle_forces_type

metaInfos.description: Information on the parallelization of the program
metaInfos.name: parallelization_info

metaInfos.description: Information on the parallelization of the program
metaInfos.name: parallelization_info_scf

metaInfos.description: Hosts that did run this simulation, this is a mapping, host->json value that might give extra program dependent information on how that host is used
metaInfos.name: parallel_tasks_assignement

metaInfos.description: Number of parallel tasks used
metaInfos.name: parallel_tasks_number

metaInfos.description: number of scf iterations at Dft level
metaInfos.name: scf_dft_niter

metaInfos.description: Wall time needed for an MP2 calculation
metaInfos.name: time_MP2

metaInfos.description: Converged Mp2 energy correction
metaInfos.name: energy_correction_MP2

metaInfos.description: Converged total MP2 energy (XC_method_sc + MP2 correction)
metaInfos.name: energy_total_MP2

metaInfos.description: Correction to the density-density electrostatic energy in the sum of eigenvalues (that uses the mixed density on one side), and the fully consistend density-density electrostatic energy
metaInfos.name: energy_correction_hartree

metaInfos.description: Correction to the density-density electrostatic energy in the sum of eigenvalues (that uses the mixed density on one side), and the fully consistend density-density electrostatic energy during the scf iterations
metaInfos.name: energy_correction_hartree_scf

metaInfos.description: Error in the hartree (electrostatic) potential energy
metaInfos.name: energy_hartree_error
stress_tensor_type
metaInfos.description: A final value of a stress tensor

metaInfos.name: stress_tensor
metaInfos.description: A final value of the default stress tensor calculated with XC_method

metaInfos.name: stress_tensor_sc
metaInfos.description: A final value of the default stress tensor calculated with XC_method_sc
Total energy (electronic + ions) calculated with the method described in XC_method
metaInfos.name: energy_total

metaInfos.description: Total energy (or equivalently free energy), electronic + ions, calculated with the method described in XC_method and extrapolated for T=0 (for metals)
metaInfos.name: energy_total_T0

metaInfos.description: Free energy (electronic + ions) (whose minimum gives the smeared occupation density) calculated with the method described in XC_method
metaInfos.name: energy_free

metaInfos.description: Converged exact exchange energy (not scaled)
metaInfos.name: energy_HF_X

metaInfos.description: Scaled (depending on the mix paramenter of the functional) exact exchange energy
metaInfos.name: energy_HF_X_scaled

metaInfos.description: Entropy correction, to have a potential energy that compensates the changes in occupation, so that forces at finite T do not need to keep the change of occupation in account. Value during the SCF cycle.
metaInfos.name: energy_correction_entropy_scf

metaInfos.description: Entropy correction, to have a potential energy that compensates the changes in occupation, so that forces at finite T do not need to keep the change of occupation in account.
metaInfos.name: energy_correction_entropy

metaInfos.description: Total electostatic energy (atom + electrons) during the scf itrations
metaInfos.name: energy_electrostatic_scf

metaInfos.description: Total electostatic energy (atom + electrons)
metaInfos.name: energy_electrostatic

metaInfos.description: Electronic kinetic energy during the scf iterations
metaInfos.name: electronic_kinetic_energy_scf

metaInfos.description: Electronic kinetic energy
metaInfos.name: electronic_kinetic_energy

metaInfos.description: Free energy (whose minimum gives a density with smeared occupation) calculated with XC_method_sc per atom during the scf iterations
metaInfos.name: energy_free_sc_per_atom_scf

metaInfos.description: Free energy (whose minimum gives a density with smeared occupation) calculated with XC_method_sc per atom
metaInfos.name: energy_free_sc_per_atom

metaInfos.description: A basis set description
metaInfos.name: basis_set_description

metaInfos.description: A global (atom independent) basis set
metaInfos.name: section_basis_set_global

metaInfos.description: A global basis set type, string should be as defined in the [basis_set_global_kind wiki page](https://nomad-dev.rz-berlin.mpg.de/wiki/MetaInfo/basis_set_global_kind).
metaInfos.name: basis_set_global_kind

metaInfos.description: A descriptive name identifying the basis set be as defined in the [basis_set_global_name wiki page](https://nomad-dev.rz-berlin.mpg.de/wiki/MetaInfo/basis_set_global_name).
metaInfos.name: basis_set_global_name

metaInfos.description: Spherical cutoff for a plane wave basis in reciprocal space, as energy of the highest plane wave ($ rac{\hbar^2|k+G|^2}{2m_e}$, constants to check!) kept into the basis. Note that normally the basis set is used for the wavefunctions, and the density would have 4 times the cutoff, but this actually depends on the use of the basis set by the method.
metaInfos.name: basis_set_plan_wave_cutoff

metaInfos.description: An atom centered basis set
metaInfos.name: section_basis_set_atom_centered

metaInfos.description: atom number of kind of atom this basis set is thought for (0 meand unspcified, or a pseudo atom)
metaInfos.name: basis_set_atom_kind_nr

metaInfos.description: Code dependent explicative and unique name of the basis function, it uses basis_set_atom_centered_base_name and if not equal to the default basis implied by that name appends the first 10 characters of the base64 url encoding of the SHA-512 of the diffs stored as normalized json, details are explained in the [basis_set_atom_centered_name wiki page](https://nomad-dev.rz-berlin.mpg.de/wiki/MetaInfo/basis_set_atom_centered_name), this name should not contain the atom kind (to simplify the use of a single name for multiple elements).
metaInfos.name: basis_set_atom_centered_name

metaInfos.description: Code dependent but explicative base name of the basis function, not unique. For example fhi-aims looks at the closest standard basis set, and uses that name. Details are explained in the [basis_set_atom_centered_base_name wiki page](https://nomad-dev.rz-berlin.mpg.de/wiki/MetaInfo/basis_set_atom_centered_base_name), this name should not contain the atom kind (to simplify the use of a single name for multiple elements).
metaInfos.name: basis_set_atom_centered_base_name

metaInfos.description: number of different kind of basis functions in this set
metaInfos.name: basis_set_atom_centered_nkinds

metaInfos.description: number of different basis functions in this set
metaInfos.name: basis_set_atom_centered_nbasis_functions

metaInfos.description: Description of one or a sub group of basis function in this basis set
metaInfos.name: section_basis_functions_atom_centered

metaInfos.description: l value (of the angular part given by the spherical harmonic $Y_{lm}$) of the basis function
metaInfos.name: basis_set_atom_centered_ls

metaInfos.description: Radial function of the different basis function kinds, the 5 values are $r$, $f(r)$, $f'(r)$, $f(r)*r$, $ rac{d}{dr}(f(r)*r)$ and are given by default on an equispaced grid from 0 to 40 $fm$
metaInfos.name: basis_set_atom_centered_radial_functions
section_basis
metaInfos.description: Represents a concrete basis set instatiated with parameters given in the section_method for the system section_system_description.

metaInfos.name: basis_kind
metaInfos.description: String describing the kind of basis set (its use, for example wavefunction). The values are described in the [basis_kind wiki page](https://nomad-dev.rz-berlin.mpg.de/wiki/MetaInfo/basis_kind).

metaInfos.name: basis_name
metaInfos.description: String identifying the basis set in an unique way. The values are described in the [basis_name wiki page](https://nomad-dev.rz-berlin.mpg.de/wiki/MetaInfo/basis_name).

metaInfos.name: basis
metaInfos.description: String identifying the basis used for the wavefunctions in an unique way. The values are described in the [basis wiki page](https://nomad-dev.rz-berlin.mpg.de/wiki/MetaInfo/basis).

metaInfos.name: section_basis_atom_centered
metaInfos.description: Atom centered part of the basis (assignement atom -> basis)

metaInfos.name: section_basis_global
metaInfos.description: Global part of the basis

metaInfos.name: section_basis_nbasis_functions
metaInfos.description: Total number of wave functions (some might need complex coefficients).
Total energy minus the same number of atomic energies of the most stable form of the element calculated with the same method (functional,...), basisset and accuracy.
metaInfos.name: energy_formation_method_consistent

metaInfos.description: Total energy minus the energy of the same number of isolated atoms calculated with the same method (functional,...), basisset and accuracy.
metaInfos.name: energy_atomization_method_consistent

metaInfos.description: Total energy minus the an atom dependent contibution that depends on method, periodicity, basisset and accuracy, fitted so that the spread of the resulting binding energies is minimized.
metaInfos.name: energy_comparable_fitted

metaInfos.description: First version of the fit of the total energy minus the an atom dependent contibution that depends on method, periodicity, basisset and accuracy, fitted so that the spread of the resulting binding energies is minimized.
metaInfos.name: energy_comparable_fitted_v1

metaInfos.description: Some estimate of the error on the converged (final) value
metaInfos.name: error_estimate

metaInfos.description: A quantity that is preserved by the evolution (for example kinetic+potential energy during NVE
metaInfos.name: conserved_quantity
